meta_description: Visit our Los Angeles museums and library, interact with art, and access free research tools.
hours_text:
## Free Admission

Admission is free, and requires a timed-entry reservation. 

[Reserve entry time](https://tickets.getty.edu/online/article/center)

### Hours

Open today 

Tuesday–Friday, Sunday
    10am–6:30pm
Saturday
    10am–9pm
Monday
    Closed

## Additional Information

  * #### Holiday Closures

The Center is closed annually on New Year's Day, Independence Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day. It will close early on Christmas Eve and New Year's Eve.

  * #### Gallery Closures

South Pavilion galleries 101 and 102 and all East Pavilion galleries are closed for renovations.

  * #### Library Hours

The Library is open Monday to Friday, 9:30am to 5pm. 

Contact [Library Reference](https://fmweb.getty.edu/griscrr/reference_form.php) to make an appointment or ask questions. 

Library services will be closed for the holidays on the following dates:  
Jan 1–2, 2026  
Jan 19, 2026  
Feb 16, 2026  
May 25, 2026  
Jun 19, 2026  
Jul 3, 2026  
Sep 7, 2026  
Oct 12, 2026  
Nov 26–27, 2026  
Dec 21–31, 2026  
Jan 1, 2027

collections_text:
1. ###  Our Locations

Enjoy the art, architecture, and gardens of our two unique sites

     * [Visit the Getty Villa Museum](https://www.getty.edu/visit/villa)
     * [Visit the Getty Center](https://www.getty.edu/visit/center)

  2. ###  Art & Archives

Our art and research collections span ancient to modern times

     * [Learn about art](https://www.getty.edu/art/)

  3. ###  Research & Conservation

We conduct and support research and conservation of visual art and cultural heritage in Los Angeles and throughout the world

     * [Explore our work](https://www.getty.edu/projects/)
     * [Find funding](https://www.getty.edu/funding/)
